parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[setFog]]. Returns the current value of the fog in range 0...1.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''fog'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_foglevel = [[fog]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Pre-Arma 3, each client and the server could have different values. In Arma 3 the value is synced across network.
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fogParams]], [[fogForecast]], [[setFog]], [[nextWeatherChange]]
</value></part></template>
